6132ec92889c0ce747ae9f7e44f90514 (22:04): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea: Given a checkout of anolis from hg, how does one integrate the wonderful new status indicators?

69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:09): damons: you're better off starting with the post-generated spec and filtering that; the mulipage splitter slits the post-generated one, that way it gets e.g. cross-references and everything automatically
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:09): er
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:10): 587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef: otherwise you have to worry about filtering out the other specs, doing substitution magic, then running anolis, etc etc etc
